713b13b7ce4610bcd0ac9fec0f3cc43693b043abcb8dc40a42a726eb330","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c13d13304ac79a83ab1c30168967d19e2203342ebbd6a9bbce4db7550522dcbf","dweb:/ipfs/QmeN5jKMN2vw5bhacr6tkg78afbTTZUeaacNHqjWt4Ew1r"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"src/LiquidityPool.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe2daf15da5f8c940bdd15edda2a92003753c30f5dc5c3c2aa7584d6adc8c8eea","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://1599765897e38191c0349b023b0b9b0cdbebcf4bec6e5bb93ed9189d08c738c7","dweb:/ipfs/QmX8VGM4SfuLb67sfNFanCzcg2PTMc2SUP4sANLAqKcQe1"]}},"version":1}

params.player: Address of the player making the bet

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `value` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

params.maxPayout: Maximum potential payout for a bet/spin

returns.reason: Reason if not allowed (empty string if allowed)

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5.05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the default value returned by this function, unless it's overridden. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.lpTokenAmount: Amount of LP tokens to redeem

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: Amount of betting tokens to stake

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `to` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `value`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Skips emitting an {Approval} event indicating an allowance update. This is not required by the ERC. See {xref-ERC20-_approve-address-address-uint256-bool-}[_approve]. NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `value`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `value`.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

acceptBet(address,uint256).notice: Accept bet amount from player (games call this when receiving bets)

canCoverPayout(uint256).notice: Check if pool can cover a potential maximum payout

canStake(uint256).notice: Check if staking is currently allowed based on max TVL

getExchangeRate().notice: Get the current exchange rate (betting tokens per LP token)

getTotalPoolValue().notice: Get total value of the pool (betting tokens held)

getTvlInfo().notice: Get current TVL and max TVL information

previewRedeem(uint256).notice: Preview how many betting tokens would be received for redeeming LP tokens

previewStake(uint256).notice: Preview how many LP tokens would be received for staking amount

redeem(uint256).notice: Redeem LP tokens for underlying betting tokens

requestPayout(address,uint256).notice: Request payout from pool (only authorized games)

rescueToken(address,uint256).notice: Rescue accidentally sent tokens (excluding betting token)

setGameAuthorization(address,bool).notice: Authorize or deauthorize a game contract

setLpStakerAuthorization(address,bool).notice: Authorize or deauthorize an LP staker

setMaxTvl(uint256).notice: Set the maximum TVL (Total Value Locked) for the pool

stake(uint256).notice: Stake betting tokens to receive LP tokens representing share of pool
